website_summaries.verdict: A premium hair dryer that delivers better results than average competitors.
pros: Provides a lot of customization when using the dryer
Comes with a good variety of control settings for the perfect drying experience
Comes with 4 specific temperature settings and 2 speed controls
cons: Too heavy to hold comfortably for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer, until it wasn't. Very powerful, dries hair quickly, this was my second one in 2 years. The first one blew up, but I liked the dryer so much that I took a chance on a 2nd one. The handle would always get hot, hotter than it should have. Today it just stopped working. Took it apart to see if it could be fixed, and found out why it got so hot. The wires were literally melted apart. So much heart, that it caused the blue coating to turn black, and the white coating turned brown. I cannot believe that this happened. This is a fire hazard, thank goodness nothing actually caught fire.
customer_reviews.author: Furious

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer while it lasted. I bought it less then a year ago and this morning when I turned it on it was making an awful shrieking noise and smelt like something was burning, so I don’t feel that it can safely be used anymore. Haven’t figured out how to try to get a refund yet, so hopefully the company will work with me.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying this one!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t review products that I do not care for, however, I feel I should alert anyone who is thinking of purchasing this dryer to think twice. Although it is a good blower per se, the control switches are absolutely terrible. It is very difficult to adjust the temperatures and also to turn it on and off. After a couple of months of torture, I finally had to decide to bite the bullet and purchase a new one... Only this time, with different switches.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Kurdyla

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought a different model
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairdryer to replace my old one that suddenly broke. I was hoping it was going to cut my dry time, but I found it takes the same amount of time as my previous competitor brand despite having more wattage. I also found that this hairdryer is a little heavier than most. Since you’re holding it for about 10 minutes, you’re arm starts to get tired. Babyliss makes a blue light weight hairdryer that I’ve tested before and I wish I spent the extra money and got that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: making noise and smells like smoke
customer_reviews.text: Well, it worked OK in the beginning (not sure if I noticed a shorter drying time and smoother hair), but now it is making a noise and it smells like smoke. I can't use it anymore. Other customers have reported this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I should have bought this kind of dryer years ago instead of all the sorry local box store ones. This dryer puts out some major air in high or low. I find the heat setting just right. With the added strength of the airflow I can dry my hair way faster than I use to. I highly recommend spending the extra bucks for this one over your local box store dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Lostie4everTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for long, thick hair.
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this dryer a long time ago. I have long and extremely thick hair, but I'm cheap, so resisted paying more than 20 or 30 bucks for a hair dryer. I finally broke down and paid $60 for this one and I love it. It doesn't get overly hot but blows like crazy on high. My hair actually gets DRY. And if I turn the blower down after my hair is mostly dry and use a large round brush, my hair smooths out just fine. Had it for a month and holding up fine so far
customer_reviews.author: R.A. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love it....
customer_reviews.text: I really expected better out of such a well-known brand, and after reading the reviews. First off, the other reviewers are NOT kidding when they say the controls are difficult to maneuver! I had to use a towel placed over the controls just to get enough traction to turn it on, and you can straight up forget about trying to turn it on with product on your hands! Second, and this is why I’m returning it - even my fiancé noticed that my hair felt more coarse & less soft after blow drying than with my trusty old Revlon ionic dryer. And come on ladies, if your man notices that your hair is feels different, IT’S DIFFERENT!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying a hair dryer. Like, a lotttttt of research, and went without one for several weeks so I’d feel good about which one I was going to purchase. Let me tell you, I am SO happy I got this product. I’ve even had girl friends use this product and after they were like, whoahhhhhh, and asked me for the link to purchase one for themselves. Sometimes you don’t even realize you’re using a crappy product until you use a nice one, which was the case for me and for them. Do buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: It deserves so many more stars. I bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: It deserves so many more stars. I bought this to replace my last one. My last one by BaByliss lasted 6 years of daily use. It traveled everywhere with me and even survived multiple drops. These dryers are amazingly strong. I used my Chi one while I waited for my BaByliss replacement to arrive and was so frustrated. The Chi was more expensive than the BaByliss one and it blew out air that was not nearly hot enough or fast enough. I will not purchase any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: NinaGo

customer_reviews.title: Cuts my drying time in half!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer, it’s not to harsh on my hair causing breakage or damage. It dries in half the time of my old blow dryer. I can just dry it with a round brush and walk out the door with out straightening or curling it’s fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: OMG!! The best blow dryer ever! 👍🏻💕😉
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! This is the best blow dryer that I have ever used!! I normally have a Target blow dryer, but my resent one just burnt out after years of daily use. I wanted to try something new. Sooo glad that I did! This BaBylissPro Ceramix Xtreme is AMAZING! I have long hair and it dried all of it within a few minutes. It’s very strong, but quite all at the same time. This is the best investment for my hair not to get to damaged from the heat. My hair is straight/ not frizzy afterwards. Highly recommended to buy this blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: nbsummer

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough for a man
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hardcore hairdryer user for manly things like keeping my body warm when shaving naked in front of the sink, and general spot heating in the bathroom. In other words, long sessions, not styling or drying hair. I bought this same model for $38 on Amazon 3 years ago. It finally died this morning. I was a bit disappointed to see the price increase 250%. So i give it 4 stars. Not for quality issues but price. I still think it's probably worth 100 dollars though, so i bought a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ibeenworkinontherailroad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these hair dryers in my gym. Mind you, I am NOT a hair dryer person. I am an air dry girl. Have been all of my life, mostly because most hair dryers I've tried in the past usually make my hair feel and look weird. However, I found myself in need of a quick drying one day after a workout, and decided to give it a whirl. It is SO fast and doesn't damage my hair or change it's natural look. I loved it so much I bought one for home use. Come to find out, it is the same maker as my straightener, which I've had for about 10 years now!! Good quality products. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairdryer Out There
customer_reviews.text: My wife has gone through about 8 hair dryers since we've been together. She says this is the best one... and so far has lasted the longest. I've tried to go cheap, because, hey... its a hair dryer. But women know the difference. Don't waste money buying two or three cheapo models when you can just get this from the start
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Product-Update-BaByliss Made It Right
customer_reviews.text: The cord just melted on the hair dryer I have had for less than 6 months. It is melted enough to realize I possibly just missed having a fire. This is my third BaBlyss hair dryer. They normally last around 5 years. In the past, I have relied heavily on these hair dryers to cut drying time for my thick, curly hair. What to do now? UPDATE; Amazon put me in touch with BaBlyiss because I was past the Amazon return period. BaBlyiss did a fantastic job of taking my information and sending me a new hair dryer. Unless I have a problem with the new product, I am very satisfied and increased my rating from 1 Star to 3.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a while.
customer_reviews.text: After two years this dryer is on its last legs. For about the last six months it has struggled to heat up or blow at full capacity. The filter is clear, but the dryer has started to smell hot and occasionally makes a funny noise. It did a fine job, but it still took about 15-20 min to dry my thick, shoulder-length hair. The dryer is too heavy to wield for that long. I purchased the Babyliss universal diffuser attachment, which is pretty hefty itself, so the two together were quite cumbersome. I did like that I could turn the concentrator nozzle as needed, but that alone is not enough for me to replace this dryer with the same model.
customer_reviews.author: P.Erskine-Brown

customer_reviews.title: The best blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Why doesn't this dryer make the top 10 list? It is lightweight enough for me and my severe tendonitis. It has multiple heat settings and multiple speed settings. The lint screen is easy to clean and the dryer is a good size. I have thin, fine hair and it works well to make my hair fuller. My friends with thick or curly hair love it too and say it takes them less time to dry than their blow dryers. I'll be buying another if/when this one needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: PearlyWhites

customer_reviews.title: Most Powerful I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a blow hard!! It literally blows hard and drys my short hair in seconds. It is noisy, but such things are subjective. The power makes styling my hair easy. It works great on my wife's hair as well. The dryer would be great for someone with long, thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I finally bit the bullet and spent more than $20 on a hair dryer and I'm glad I did. The $20 ones seem to always break just before the one year mark (I dry my hair about every other day). I'm hoping this one lasts a bit longer. I have a short bob hair style (above my shoulders) which usually takes about 12-15 mins to dry. Today with this new hair dryer it took just under 10 mins! Every second in the morning counts, so I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime K

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this hairdryer for a year. About 3 months ago, the dryer started to give off a terrible smell. I have to hold my breath while drying my hair because the dryer smells like there’s some chemical burning in it. I’ve bought a different hair dryer before from the same company (which was stolen and out of stock when I tried to reorder) and I really liked it but this one is no good.
customer_reviews.author: dec.triplets

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with the Black Orchid Xtava diffuser. It’s a great dryer, but I wish the warm heat setting was a little cooler. I follow the Curly Girl Method, and so use only very low heat. The warm gets hot after a while, and the cool setting has no heat. I end up switching back and forth between cool and warm when using the dryer to get a low heat. I would still purchase again. If you use heat styling on your hair, this is a great dryer, and the matte black is really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: tandlweiss

customer_reviews.title: Babyliss doesn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blow dryer. I will admit, I’m a blow dryer snob. I dry my hair daily, so i need a dryer that is strong and warm enough. I’ve always used Babyliss Nano Titanium dryers, but decided to try this one when my beloved blow dryer finally bit the dust after several years of daily use. I was not disappointed! It compares to the higher priced models but for a cheaper price. I gave it fewer stars for lightweight and good for traveling, but If i wanted a lightweight travel dryer i would have bought a travel dryer. It’s full size and medium weight, which is what i wanted. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Leah W.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good For My Long, Thick Hair
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this hairdryer since it had very good reviews. While I am sure this is a great dryer, it was not good for my hair. This replaced my $20 Revlon I had for literally 10 YEARS. This thing is powerful - don’t get me wrong. It seems sturdy, well made and pretty light. I have very think, long hair, and this always left my hair feeling slightly damp, actually took about 20 minutes LONGER to dry my hair, and just left it looking like a frizzy mess. For short hair, I’m sure this is a solid choice. It literally left mine looking like I stood in a wind tunnel, with no smoothness or shine. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Flores

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Dryer, Fits Black Orchid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016, and it's still going strong. I had one I purchased previously at a salon that lasted several years as well (until I dropped it just right for the last time). I'm not great at doing hair so I couldn't tell you if it does a better job than other dryers, but it is very sturdy without feeling excessively heavy, is nice and powerful, has all the heat and power settings I want, and lasts an age. Not great for travel due to the weight, but I like that it feels substantial. For anyone with curly hair or doing the curly girl method, this dryer does fit with the xtava black orchid diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: A. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Dryer And Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when I used this dryer for the first time. It dried my hair in no time and it did not make a lot of noise. I would say that it's the best dryer I've had, but there is one design flaw that needs to be addressed. The on - off switch and fan power switch are one and the same. However, when you blindly reach with your thumb to turn the dryer off, your thumb cannot find the switch. This switch is just a few millimeters beneath where it should be. Other than that, this is a super dryer. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Still works after 9 years!!! (2020)
customer_reviews.text: I felt the need to finally write a review on this item because it still works after 9 years! 9 YEARS!!! Bought it August 2011! It’s still holding strong. Sometimes it won’t go to “high” especially on high heat but after some finagling... you can get it. That’s the only reason I’ve debating buying a new one because I figure it’ll go out one day. But the heat and pressure are still there. Works pretty great! But dang y’all. Still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dryer like this and I’ve given it as a gift. I love it, it dries my hair so fast. I travel with it. Just don’t drop it or knock it on the wall, it will crack all over! But I super glued my last one several times because I like it so much. This one hasn’t cracked at all, I guess I learned to be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: wildeflower

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell, poor quality, heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst dryer I've ever owned. 3 months after purchase, the engine sounded like it was slowing down, and there was a burning smell. I paid the $17 return shipping (becauae it is so heavy!!) to Conair for warranty replacement and was sent a new dryer, no questions asked. I've had that dryer 2 months now, and here we go with a squealing noise this morning. I expect the burning smell will soon follow. This dryer feels like a fire hazard. I don't write reviews..... ever.... but I felt the need to warn others. Save your money. Hopefully Conair (Babyliss hq) will recall this dryer because based on other reviews, my incident is not an anomaly.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Not better than my old $25 Revlon tourmaline hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this hair dryer to be anything special. My old Revlon tourmaline hair dryer broke, so I thought I would upgrade with my next hair dryer. I have to admit that my $25 Revlon hair dryer was just as good or possibly better than the BaBylissPRO Ceramix Xtreme. I have very thick, slightly wavy, fine hair, and reading the reviews for this hair dryer, I was expecting that it would cut down my drying time and make my hair sleeker. I was disappointed that it did neither of those things.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Dries Hair Quickly with Less Frizz
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is low on noise, high on drying hair without a lot of frizz. My sisters have both had this dryer for the last 3 years. I've used theirs and love it! I was excited to see it available here and quickly bought one. It works great on my thin, wavy hair that is frizz prone. Even my 13 year old daughter (who has always hated having her hair dried) doesn't mind it. She has thicker hair than me. It dries hair quickly and leaves it smooth. My daughter likes that it isn't as noisy as most dryers. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette pernotto

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 years, gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: This dryer broke almost 4 years exactly after I bought it. I expected it to last longer but the on/off buttons came lose quite suddenly and I can no longer turn it on. The last year or so the handle would become too hot to use. I have medium length hair so I wasn't using it for an excessive amount of time. Prior to the last year it worked well and I was pleased, but quite disappointed that it only lasted 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This is one powerful hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I have medium long, thick, hair that loves to hang onto water. It can take forever to dry with a low powered hair dryer. The Babyliss gets the job done pretty quickly. It does get really hot on the highest setting, so beware of heat damage if you use that setting and dry your hair frequently. I am an occasional hair dryer/styler. So, I'm not really to concerned about the heat. The medium setting gets pretty hot too, and should work well for most hair types. I do wish that it came with more attachments. I really like how you can remove the filter to clean it out. Overall, an excellent hair dryer for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Gal

customer_reviews.title: Where's the heat?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this hairdryer for the last 10 year because I love it. I was not happy that the price went up almost 10 dollars from a year and a half ago but it didn't matter because I still think it's the best hairdryer for the money. The only problem I'm having with the one I just purchased is that it doesn't seem to have the same amount of heat (on hot) as it used to. I hope they didn't turn down the temperature as my thick, wavy hair needs to straighten! I'm thinking the one I got is defective so I might return and try a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: 4 years old and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer 4 years ago in 2016. It's still going STRONG! Sometimes I think it's losing its "umph" and then I travel and use a different blow dryer and realize how much I miss mine! Any time my friends are over and have to use it, they can't believe the power and the speed at which it dries your hair. I absolutely love this blow dryer and if it ever stops working, I will never stray away from Babyliss. HOWEVER: The nozzle melted pretty easily and I have had the hardest time finding a replacement one that fits. The dryer still works great without it though.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on high setting
customer_reviews.text: Only works on low setting. Is this a real product or counterfeit? No info for return.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairdryer for the first time several years ago and decided then that I'd never buy anything else. I love it! If you've considered the purchase of a quality hair dryer that won't totally break the budget, this is the one to try. Dries hair quickly, relatively quietly, and leaves your hair with less damage and noticeably shiny. The dryer stays cool to the touch and lasts far longer than the cheaper ones you'd buy at the drugstore or Target or Wal-Mart. When my first one finally died, I was thrilled to see that Amazon was carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: rachael trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten more compliments on this blow dryer from visitors than any other blow dryer I have owned. I bought this one as a gift for my sister. Every time we visit each other she begs me to leave for her. It blows hot and fierce. It’s not a travel size but I never travel without it. Highly recommended for people that want to blow dry fast and style or straighten. I have naturally curly hair and this is the best I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Super Well Built
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dryer. I ave not used on in 20 years, but finally got tired of going out in the morning with wet hair. The texture of the entire device is slip resistant, helping to keep your grip true wherever you hold it. The sound of the electric blower is pleasing, deep, and substantial (not loud and tinny). I especially like the cool setting and use it the most. Well worth the spend, especially when i was considering spending $100 on another model.
customer_reviews.author: Tim-in-Somerville

customer_reviews.title: Good for fine hair-Heat not too hot
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Ceramic ion heat Cool setting AND cool shot button 2 heat settings and 2 speeds Price Cons: Too big to fit in my vanity draw. Too heavy Buttons are difficult to slide on/off If it were exactly half its size and weighed under a pound, this black Babyliss pro ceramix would be perfect for my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: A workhorse of a dryer!
customer_reviews.text: My old BaByliss Ceramix Extreme finally bit the dust. I went into my orders to reorder a new dryer and found the one that stopped working was purchased in 2010! It's used every day by both my husband and myself. Well, it's now 2020....I've NEVER had a dryer last 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Robinson

customer_reviews.title: lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: love this, it is my second one, the power of wind it gives off is soo strong!!!! my last one lasted me 10 years and is still going. I needed a new once since I live between 2 homes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the motor size and quickness in drying my hair. I have thin short hair and I like to get some lift on top and this defiantly has helped with that . The high setting for the heat is pretty hot so be careful to not fry your hair . Also it has the cool setting so you can set your hair strands after to help protect them .
customer_reviews.author: Jaustin

customer_reviews.title: best hairdryer i've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid and attractive hair dryer--the nicest i've ever had. Very strong air flow, good options for various settings, and it's so nice looking that we got a wall mount blow dryer holder so we can keep it out al the time! i love the black color and it feels well built and has a nice heft in your hands as you use it. i've never spent more than 25 bucks on a hairdryer before, but this one is clearly worth the slight extra expense. i expect it to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: dogged

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blow dryer!! It dries my hair in half the time and I have thick hair that’s down to my tail bone.. it lasts forever and keeps my hair healthy. I won’t ever use any other blow dryer but this one! And I’ve used many throughout my life. This one lasts the longest and works the best. Sometimes I don’t have time to wait for my hair to dry but I know I have my babyliss to turn to. It’s a bit heavy but what good blow dryer isn’t? Love, love love. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cadie Alena

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my last one -- definitely a step down
customer_reviews.text: I had the prior version of this dryer and it was THE BEST!! Lasted for years, powerful, nozzle was perfect and was easy to turn on and off and adjust settings. The new one already is squeaking after 4 months of use, and if my thumb is the slightest bit damp, I can't turn it on or off. The other switches were so easy to use. Also, the nozzle is too wide, so doesn't focus the heat as well for straightening. Still likely better than most on the market, but as a replacement, it was worse rather than better than my last Babyliss dryer. Seems cheaper in a number of ways.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend who’s a hairdresser. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Heathyr P

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer so much! My hair is softer using a higher quality dryer! You could travel with it but I feel something smaller and mote compact would be easier unless your taking a checked bag. Would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is on the hefty side. But...because it drys really fast I don't have to hold it for to long (I have short hair). So my arm doesn't fatigue. Also, I have NEVER used the high hot heat setting on any hair dryer I have owned because it was to hot and would burn. BUT...I have used the hot setting since I started using this dryer. It's not really all that hot and still drys faster than my old dryer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Does not last very long
customer_reviews.text: It lasts about a year and then it went up in smoke! All of a sudden when I started using it, there was this horrible burning plastic smell. I thought it was the styling cap. We took that off. Then it started popping and making beeping noises! Terrible quality. It was a decent dryer while it lasted.. but the durability is just garbage. Might as well by a better one made by someone else. My husband's hair dryer (and he won't stop bragging about it) is still going strong after 5 years. This one barely made it one year. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Angie

customer_reviews.title: This hair dyer is HEAVY...
customer_reviews.text: The BEAUTIFUL hair dryer is heavy but EFFICIENT and I take VERY good care of it---As I read the reviews: If turned to max speed, it may blow up, burn (not last) I really don't know about traveling since I haven't traveled and plan in NOT traveling with all the CRAZINESS going on in the world... Thank you, Laura
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Like the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews, it is a bit heavy, but it dries my hair so quickly, so it's not really a problem. I like the different attachments provided. It is powerful, so I happen to get a lot of tangles, but nothing my wet brush won't get out. I don't see a huge difference in the "ceramic technology". My hair still frizzes with the humidity, not as much, but it's still there.
customer_reviews.author: M512

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied with this product. I really like babyliss because of their amazing quality. But this one is a little bit weird. I mean it dries your hair very good, but it’s heavy and it smell so bad, as a cheap Chinese product. I know sometimes it happens, but after a few days smell should disappear. I have been used it couple of weeks and it still smells as hell. Especially when it works. Wouldn’t suggest you to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia

customer_reviews.title: Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I need a hairdryer that has a long cord so that is why I don’t get the cheap dryers. This one has great heat or less heat depending on what you want but unfortunately I think that it is a bit too heavy. I am sure I’ll get used to it but my last dryer was lighter and had a long cord.
customer_reviews.author: Chef T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. I’ve only used once so we will see if it stands the test of time, but it’s a great blow dryer. It is the first time I’ve bought something other that something from target and it’s drying time is amazing in comparison to my old dryers. Almost cut my time in half!!! Not a good travel dryer, but that’s okay I knew it wouldn’t be.
customer_reviews.author: love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one. Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a hairstylist for 20+ years and have tried 100’s of dryers... it’s a little heavy for non professional use, but well worth it for the fast dry time, longevity of the dryers motor/heat life. The price point is so worth it for this dryer! I definitely recommend it/buy this one for my clients who finally realize that the main difference nobody considers beyond products is the quality of your dryer!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily P.

customer_reviews.title: Dries so fast!
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded to this on a recommendation from my hair stylist cousin. I love it -- dries soooo much faster than my old hairdryer. It is a little heavy as people said, but I probably wouldn't have thought too much about it if I hadn't already heard that. Removable air direct tip thing works as well. I found it a bit tricky to move the power level and heat level buttons up and down, but not a big deal. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Attachments are ill fitting. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer, but the attachment that focuses the air does not stay still. So when you’re trying to dry one part of your hair, the nozzle moves and it blows somewhere else. I had to return it, but I was sad to do it because otherwise this dryer was top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Good for my fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this dryer for about a month, and I really like it so far. I wanted to get away from the negative ion dryers because I felt that they were killing my hair. I searched for awhile and ended on this one. It gives my hair some volume without making it silky- which is exactly what I wanted. I do wish that it got a little hotter, but I can use it as is. I have fine hair but a lot of it, and I use this on the low/hot setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Blower is a good size but too Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how heavy this darn thing is. I didn't use it until my return date was over. Assuming BaByliss was a good brand, I didn't worry too much, but this item is entirely too heavy. I have never owned a blow dryer this heavy. I hate it. Learned my lesson, Blow dryers, curling irons, nor flat irons have been a good purchase for me over the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious hair dryer. I have long, thick and wavy hair--and tons of it--and this dryer does the job quickly! I wouldn't recommend it for those who have thin hair...it might get fried. The only con I can think of is that its heavy and when you have as much hair as I do, it gets fatiguing to hold it up. It's worth it to me as I spend less time drying my hair overall. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: GoJessGo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful hairdryer with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: Really blows like a champ. The heat temperatures are just right and the cool is actually very cool almost instantly. The switches for temperature and on/of are hard to move. They are very flat to the handle and getting an easy grip on them is iffy. Also, the cool blast button on mine started sticking in the on position within a couple weeks after I got it. It requires pushing on it several times and so far it has sprung back. I don't have high hopes on that though. I gave it 4 stars in spite of what I consider a couple of pretty annoying features because otherwise it's terrific.
customer_reviews.author: PNWrez

customer_reviews.title: Only dryer for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I've purchased this same model. The first one cracked after being dropped on the floor, and the second one seems to have blown a circuit or something after being used for almost 3 years. I find it to be heavier than your average dryer but I don't mind getting a bit of an arm workout whenever I use it. No other dryer I've used can dry my thick hair faster. I do wish the buttons were easier to manipulate; they can be annoying when my hands are damp or have just been lotioned. I have seen this same dryer in salons and I've even had friends buy their own after using mine. Definitely highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: an_other_me

customer_reviews.title: Works great, until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Loved this hair dryer at first, fast powerful drying but it lasted less than a year. It overheats to the point that it tripped the gfci it was plugged into. It smells horrible and I am now afraid to use it for fear it will cause a fire. I have had it less than a year. I have a cheap dryer that has lasted years, for what this cost, it is not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: pshim

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but not too hot
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hair dryer! I purchased one a couple of years ago, and loved it so much that I gifted one to my mom too. It dries my hair quickly, and leaves it feeling shiny. It doesn’t get too hot, even on the hottest setting, which I really like. It helps keep my hair healthy, even though I frequently blow dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I have short hair which is easy to dry so it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to go with the Babyliss PRO. What I immediately found was that it is quite heavy and because the handle is thick, it's hard to grip it. I have short hair which is easy to dry so it gets the job done. As I was drying my hair I was thinking that if I had long hair, which took longer to dry, I would need to take a break to give my arm a rest. If you have long hair or need to spend time drying your hair there are better choices.
customer_reviews.author: ejestin

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance! And boy am I glad! I stayed in a high end hotel in Seattle which had this type of hair dryer in the room. So I quickly got on Amazon while I was still there and ordered one right away. It was waiting on me when I got home! It dries quickly without damaging my hair. I will warn you, the 'hot' setting is really hot. I keep it on warm.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blow dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This came today and I actually used it for the first time today. It’s lightweight, yet a good sturdy blow dryer. I have long thick hair to the middle of my back and I tr this came today and I actually used it for the first time today. It’s lightweight, yet a good sturdy blow dryer. I have long thick hair to the middle of my back and it dried my hair very quickly. I don’t know how it holds up the long term but so far I like it
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Your hair/clap will thank you
customer_reviews.text: I've always used cheap conair blow dryers, because I never thought that it made much of a difference. I was wrong. This leaves my hair much less frizzy and not as dry. I really think this is also just better for my hair and scalp due to infrared heat. I refuse to spend $100-$200 on a blow dryer because that seems frivolous and pointless. This dryer has all the qualities of a more expensive one, leaves hair healthier and more manageable and is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Dryer for Long Hair
customer_reviews.text: Best hair dryer ever! I usually go through a hair dryer every 4-6 months. This has by far lasted the longest (over a year). It has just the right amount of power (enough to dry long hair, but not so much that it blows you away). Does not overheat or lose power. Does not trip the breaker in my bathroom. The nose is long enough that your hair doesn't get sucked up in the motor. Not a lot of special features or attachments. Has 3 temp settings plus the cold shot and 2 speeds. No difusser but can be bought separately if needed. A little heavy, but I find it balances well in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Poirier

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it this year, however...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it in February this year, and this month it started making a weird sound after I stop using it, sounds like something is really tight and the sound keeps increasing, so not sure if I will continue to use it. My other Babyliss lasted a good 5 years, and it was easier to hold and manage... So feel a bit sad about it...
customer_reviews.author: N. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This hairdryer fits my xtava diffuser!!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that it fit my favorite diffuser!! It’s a little heavy, but I think the ceramic makes my curly hair dry faster even on low heat.
customer_reviews.author: curlycindy

customer_reviews.title: Cord exploded off the hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: The hair dryer exploded in my hand! A big spark and a lot pop, smoke, and the hair dryer blew off of the cord. Absolutely terrifying! Thank goodness nothing caught on fire. I’ve owned this hair dryer for a few years, but I’ve had other hair dryers for a lot longer and nothing like this has ever happened.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: I think the price went up a little to much but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blow dryer in 2014 and it still works as of today. I had tried so many different ones over the years and I must say this one is by dar the best $39 I spent. I have two daughters with long hair we use this on a daily basis. It has been dropped, thrown and stopped on by my kids. I would recommend and by it over and over again
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Terrible Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dryer for a little over a year and now the low setting no longer works. The dryer won’t actually turn on until it’s switched to high. Overall I think this has been an exceptional dryer but when spending at higher price points, I’d expect a dryer to last years, not months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tuel

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding & powerful Blow Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding heating & cooling ability without over heating the motor. You will not burn yourself with the filter area at the motor area, it stays cool to touch. Nice feel & grip in your hand. Also nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both use it - and wow it is SO much better than my last hair dryer! Dries fast, leas frizz, and really my hair is ready if I don’t want to iron or curl it! Leaves my hair soft I have long wavy brown hair, and lots of it (Irish/German heritage). And it works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The drier itself works good and the settings are nice. This drier definitely dries my hair faster than my old one. Cons: I finally broke down and bought an ionic blow drier in the hopes that it make a difference in cutting down on the frizziness of my hair, but alas it does not - it's just like any other hair drier out there. So if you are buying it for that reason don't get your hopes up. Also, the paint was chipped off all over the top of the drier and it did not look new. Thank goodness it's black so you can't tell as much if not I would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Starlite

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dryer- works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hair dryer- it works very well! It's heavier than I thought it would be, but not so heavy as to be uncomfortable or difficult to use. I would prefer not to have to travel with it as it's pretty good size and a little heavy. For use at home, though, it's a very nice dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blow dryer!!! I was hesitant at first buying it online because I have very curly hair and I have to have blow dryer that is salon quality. This one does NOT get as hot as the salon ones but it does not need to. It takes just a little longer to dry my hair and it is a little heavier by it is all worth it. My hair looks healthy and shiny it looks like i just walked out of the salon on a daily basis. Seriously considering buying another one just for a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dryer ever.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best blow dryer I have ever used!!! I used to manage an Ulta beauty store and have tried out tons of blow dryers. This one is by far the most powerful. I have thick, curly hair and when I blow dry my hair with this one it gets dry faster and is straighter. I purchased the Babyliss Pro Nano Titanium Universal Finger Diffuser to use when I want to keep my hair curly and they work great together. I had the dryer for about a month now and still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maralee Hanners

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair faster
customer_reviews.text: This dries hair faster than my ordinary hair dryer. The blower is strong. The switches were awkward at first but they did become easier with time. Others have noted this but I still like the product. The size of the dryer itself is not overly big and the cord is long but not overly long or thick. It is not heavy to hold. Yes toggle switch would be easier but for the price I believe the dryer is a good value so still saying 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I did a lot of research before buying this hairdryer because I needed something with enough power to blow dry long hair and that wouldn't melt or stop functioning after a a few weeks. So, after careful consideration I purchased this model and I do not regret it. It works great and I can get my hair dry in a reasonable amount of time. So far I am very happy with it. And I love the soft, satin like touch. The only thing that could be slightly better are the buttons - they can be a bit hard to move, but in general they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia L.

customer_reviews.title: Up until this week it worked great! This week
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer lasted 11 months! Up until this week it worked great! This week, a burned smell began coming from it and the next day, it began making a very high pitched squealing noise. Needless to say, it has been thrown. I had purchased this brand since it was highly rated. It lasted for less time than cheaper brands did. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hair care
customer_reviews.text: Best hair dryer I have ever used. Bought on for each bathroom and a spare. It's that good!
customer_reviews.author: ceknoian

customer_reviews.title: Bad Switches
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer as most other people say. As long as it is not a fire hazard. This July it would be 4 years old. I don't know how long a hair dryer should last so this might be fine. As with others on Amazon, the power switch is not secure when turned on. I checked the reviews here and found this to be a common problem. Rather dangerous. At this time I am not bothering to contact the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon W Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect hair dryer. Powerful. Quiet. My beauty operator uses this and that's why I bought my own. She's been a stylist for 25 years; she's had only 2 of these in that length of time. Quality for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JanCando

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the slide buttons to turn on and change heat ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the slide buttons to turn on and change heat settings....too difficult to maneuver with one hand. It is necessary for me to put down styling brush and change settings, and they are difficult to slide., usually have to use my nail to slide up or down. If I use high speed, which I like for back of my hair, the warm setting is too hot, so I have to switch to low speed. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rapanzel

customer_reviews.title: ¡FUERTE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hairdryer ever. I photographed the model number from my stylists’ chair at the salon about two years ago and fantasized about the day I got one. And the day finally came! Powerful and heavy like a proper machine should be, this thing is powerful. I use it to groom my beard as well as my head. My old one had been relegated to my gym bag. My hair is a triumph now.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: A bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: The fake rubber coating on this hair dryer starts to break down over time and becomes a tacky mess that, to my knowledge, cannot be fixed. Nothing about this hair dryer makes up for this defect.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got this same hair dryer back when I started hair school in 2009. It finally cracked so much (from dropping it several times) that I decided to buy another one to replace it. It is the best blow dryer I've ever used. Its super powerful! It has 2 speed settings and 3 temperature settings. It has a "cool" button that changes the air flow to cool even if you have it set to hot. It is a little bit heavier than other dryers, but I think it's twice as powerful. I truly love it!
customer_reviews.author: Connor W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this twice love it for many reasons , my other only lasted a year but Im sure because my husband used it as a heater in bathroom after his showers , so I bought a cheap one for him and dare him to use this one , but if it stops working I will buy another , Im 56 yrs old and have bought many but I will never purchase nothing but this one for me .
customer_reviews.author: Smiling Linda  :)

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality anymore
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what happened to this brand. My older Babyliss dryer was amazing. It was powerful, had great heat. This newer model doesn’t have the same drying power, I often have to check if it’s on high heat. So frustrating. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BooyeyIt

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than I'm used to, but after a few days of use I didn't notice it anymore. Dries my hair a little faster and the medium heat setting is perfect to smooth it out. I like the on/off and heat setting switches Bc they slide, so I don't accidentally press them while using. I've had it for a few weeks and so far feel it was worth the price... I'd recommend it:)
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: ... the Babyliss straightener and their other blow dryers and loved it so I thought this one would be just ...
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago I purchased the Babyliss straightener and their other blow dryers and loved it so I thought this one would be just as good. It doesn't leave my hair as straight or frizz free like their other hair dryer so I'm disappointed. This dryer leaves my hair poofy. It's not as strong as the dryer I bought two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Salon grade dryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife on Valentines. Believe me...if this dryer had any flaws I'd certainly hear about it. Also purchased a wall mount holder which works great and is affordable...
customer_reviews.author: Derek Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Best dryer I've ever had... I'm purchased 3 times! First time because I was looking for a good quality hair dryer and this one seemed like it fit what I was looking for! Loved it so much, Second time bought for a friend and this 3rd time because I wore out my first one!
customer_reviews.author: hmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: My 10lb BaByliss drier from beauty school FINALLY quit on me. I am licensed so I shopped around the professional supply stores for a replacement. This drier is great, I am constantly changing the settings with toggle switches positioned on the inside of the handle (where this drier's controls are also located) but this has sliders! Perfect for the way I blowdry (I spin the drier and use the opposite end to cool the hair very quickly rather than waiting for the cool shot to kick in). Half the price of the supply stores! All around solid drier for personal and professional use/abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Reid, White and Blue

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Based on the amount of positive reviews, was excited to get this product. But after a few weeks, I will be replacing. There are two major flaws 1. The high heat is not that hot and 2. The high air flow is so powerful that my hair often turns into knots when I’m done, even with my best effort to control it with styling brushes. My morning routine has gotten longer because of this product.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer! I wish I would have bought this sooner!!! I had it in my cart for ages before I finally allowed myself to buy it (only because I'm cheap.) I will never go back to the $20 Wal-Mart/Target dryers again. It drys my hair without getting it all crisp and frizzy. I've noticed less split ends the last 5 months and the only thing in my hair routine to change was this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Igga's Girl

product_meta.title: BaBylissPRO Ceramix Xtreme Dryer
product_meta.description:
The BaBylissPRO Ceramix Xtreme 2000-watt dryer uses ceramic technology for extra-gentle, even, far-infrared heat that protects hair from damage. The extended narrow barrel helps to maximize the 'Xtreme' air pressure & the professional AC motor ensures many hours of drying time. Six heat & speed setting are available & the soft, rubberized housing is comfortable to handle. There's a cold shot button to lock in style, plus a narrow concentrator nozzle, & a 9-foot professional grade cord for easy maneuverability. With a professional-level motor & extra-high wattage, this high-quality, lightweight blow dryer can do it all.

BRAND STORY
BaBylissPRO is the world’s leading producer of innovative, high-performance professional styling tools. Chosen by hairdressers, barbers, and clients everywhere, BabylissPRO styling tools are versatile and engineered to last.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
The customer can reach out to BaByliss for inquiries. 18007264202

See more

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
